description: This is a full-stack ledger management app built for learning,, and showcasing real-world backend practices. Features include an optional passcode encryption for sensitive records, animated splash screen for brand touch and a triple-layer data validation.
UTSAV is a modern, full-stack web application designed to provide a centralized platform for organizers and participants to engage seamlessly in events of all scales.
This very portfolio you're viewing - showcases my journey, achievements & skills  with dynamic content and immersive animations.
